mapper.select: SELECT SH.ShelfId, SH.ShelfName, SH.Description, SH.NumberStacks, SH.CreatedTime, SH.UpdatedTime, SH.ReasonInactive, STT.StatusID, STT.StatusName, CM.CameraId, CM.CameraName, CM.ImageURL, CM.IPAddress, CM.RTSPString, CM.CreatedTime AS CMCreatedTime, CM.UpdatedTime AS CMUpdatedTime FROM tblShelf SH JOIN tblStore ST ON SH.StoreId = ST.StoreId JOIN tblStatus STT ON SH.StatusId = STT.StatusId LEFT JOIN tblShelfCameraMapping SCM ON SH.ShelfId = SCM.ShelfId AND SCM.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblCamera CM ON SCM.CameraId = CM.CameraId WHERE SH.ShelfId = #{shelfId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tblShelf SET ShelfName = #{shelfName}, Description = #{description}, UpdatedTime = convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{updatedTime}) WHERE ShelfId = #{shelfId}
mapper.insert:
